contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 7, 2015 D SWBBA Contest (Open Section)
SWBBA Contest (Open Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest South West BBA Annual Championships swbba-contest-open-section
Riviera International Conference Centre, Torquay, Devon, England, UK Cornet player from Verwood Concert Brass won the Maurice Gooding Trophy for Best Cornet Player. Verwood Concert Brass won the Jerwood Bowl for highest placed First Section Band. Sidmouth Town won the Allen Whittaker Memorial Cup for the highest placed Second Section Band.
May 21, 2015, 11:27 a.m. Nov. 14, 2015, 7 p.m.
1 Aldbourne Band Joshua Ruck Dances and Alleluias
2 Verwood Concert Brass Kevin Smith Dances and Arias
3 St. Dennis Band Darren R. Hawken Elgar Variations
4 Lydbrook Band Glyn Williams Salute to Youth
5 South West Comms Band David Shead Variations on a Ninth
6 Helston Town Band David Johnson Sinfonietta for Brass Band - The Wayfarer
7 Sidmouth Town Band Adrian Harvey The Saga of Haakon the Good
8 Chalford Band Steve Tubb English Heritage
9 Lanner and District Silver Band Stuart Chappell John O'Gaunt [Vinter]
Withdrawn Hyde Band Jonathan Lush-Camps
